refsystem.change: SELECT DISTINCT r_refextobj.refextobjid AS ID, r_refextobj.aikz As Aktiv, r_refextobj.tabelle As Tabelle, r_refextobj.tabpk As Tabpk, r_refextobj.refsystem AS RefSys, r_refextobj.refid As RefID, r_refextobj.sortierung As Sort, r_refextobj.zeitstempel As Zeitstempel FROM r_refextobj WHERE r_refextobj.tabpk = [personal.pid] AND r_refextobj.tabelle = 'personal' ORDER BY 5

params.select: SELECT r_refextobj.refextobjid FROM r_refextobj WHERE r_refextobj.tabelle = 'personal' AND r_refextobj.tabpk = [personal.pid] AND r_refextobj.refsystem = [r_refextobj.refsystem]
